styles.header: w-full bg-[#001F3F] p-4 flex items-center justify-between mb-12 mx-auto text-white
styles.h6: text-base leading-[1.6] text-[#001F3F] font-medium mb-2 tracking-[1px] uppercase
styles.button: w-max p-3 px-8 rounded cursor-pointer uppercase self-end text-white bg-[#0074D9] mb-4 flex items-center gap-2 hover:bg-[#0056A0]
styles.input: px-3 py-2 border border-[#D9D9D9] rounded-md text-base text-[#333333]
styles.textarea: px-3 py-2 border border-[#D9D9D9] rounded-md text-base text-[#333333]
styles.select: px-3 py-2 border border-[#D9D9D9] rounded-md text-base text-[#333333] outline-0 shadow-none
styles.label: text-base mb-1 block text-[#333333]
styles.th: p-3 border border-[#D9D9D9] bg-[#0074D9] text-white text-left
styles.blockquote: p-4 my-4 border-l-4 border-[#FF4136] bg-[#F8F8FF] italic text-[#333333]
styles.code: font-mono text-sm bg-[#F0F8FF] text-[#0074D9] px-2 py-1 rounded
styles.pre: font-mono text-sm bg-[#F0F8FF] text-[#0074D9] p-4 rounded overflow-x-auto
